original: Berlin, Karl Gustaf Yngve, rektor. Torsås, f. 13/7/93 i Västerstad, Malmöh. 1, av kyrkoh. Måns B. o. Klara Löwegren. G. 20 m. Anna Johansson. Barn: Knut f. 22, Gertrud 25. — Stud:ex. i Lund 11, fil. kand. där 13, folkskoll :ex. i Växjö 16. Vik. adj. v. Växjö folksk :sem. 16-17, ord. folkskoll. i Nyköp. 18-21, ord. ämneslär. i matem., fysik, kemi o. teckr^ v. Torsås k o mm. mellan sk. 21, rektor där 35, adj. i matem. o. fysik samt rektor v. skolans ombild. t. samrealsk 44.
translated: Berlin, Karl Gustaf Yngve, rektor (principal/headmaster). Born in Västerstad, Malmöh on July 13th, 1893 to the church minister Måns B. and Klara Löwegren. Married to Anna Johansson in 1920 with two children – Knut, born in 1922, and Gertrud, born in 1925. Studied at Lund University, graduating with a degree in philosophy in 1913, and obtained a teaching certificate for elementary school in Växjö in 1916. Worked as a substitute teacher at Växjö elementary school from 1916 to 1917, and as a full-time elementary school teacher in Nyköping from 1918 to 1921. Was an appointed subject teacher of mathematics, physics, chemistry, and drawing in Torsås from 1921, and became the principal of a newly established secondary school in Torsås in 1935. He also served as a subject teacher of mathematics and physics while serving as the principal of the secondary school from 1944 onward.

structured.name: Karl Gustaf Yngve Berlin
jobTitle: Subject Teacher of Mathematics and Physics
